description.en: Manage your favorite football team in Online Soccer Manager (OSM)! This free-to-play game contains all real and authentic football leagues, clubs and players in the world.
description.ga_IE: Bainistigh an fhoireann peile is fearr leat i mBainisteoir Sacair Líne (OSM)!Sa chluiche seo-le-PLAY seo tá gach sraithe, clubanna agus imreoirí peile fíor agus barántúla ar fud an domhain.
